data.message:
Hi Facebook

i've sent my passport already for my original account that you guys shut down and its been a month or so and i still have the "investigation" notice

when this account was made, it also got reported and i submitted my passport but got this recovered quick.. what happened with my original account? i also sent a PM about it and no one bothered to even read about it

oh, and it's all about because of a name WHICH my passport supported..
